about_me.title: About Me
about_me.description_part_1: Computer Scientist since 2018, passionate about technology, family and nature, I am always looking to improve, sharing what I know and have fun creating anything that rounds my interests.
about_me.description_part_2: I tried to just stay as a Back-End, but honestly, I love to see a screen with functional buttons and inputs, so I'm always working with the Front-End too. I don't hate desktop development model or anything, but I think Web is the best, that's why I focused on the Web world, learning HTML, CSS and JavaScript and I intend on moving to something more complex later, like Node.js and React.
about_me.description_part_3: I'm always with some project and ideas motivating me to study and practise, I love feeling productive, so if there's something you want to discuss, do make it happen, talk to me, I'd love to contribute and help.

services.title: Experiences
services.description: These are some experience I won working with technology until now.

list.description: At Venturus, working in the Back-End and Front-End teams on projects for national and international clients, built in Node.js and React.
list.technologies: Node.js - React - JavaScript - TypeScript - Automated tests - Docker - MySQL - PostgreSQL - Git - Scrum

list.description: At Tech4Humans Brasil, working in the Back-End team on a project focused on real-time messenger for human care, build in Node.js and React.
list.technologies: Node.js - Docker- PostgreSQL - Redis - Serverless - Git - Scrum

list.description: At Ranor Rastreamento, working in Back-End, Front-End and Mobile projects focused on vehicle tracking, fleet management and transport logistics, built in Node.js, PHP and IONIC.
list.technologies: PHP - IONIC - React - Node.js - HTML - CSS - JavaScript - Docker - PostgreSQL

list.description: As computer technician, I worked on some companies and as autonomous, working with maintenance of desktop computers, laptops, network infrastructure and client attendance.

objective.title: Objective
objective.description: I am seeking a challenging opportunity as a web developer, where I can apply my experience in both front-end and back-end to contribute to the growth and success of the company. I am committed to learning new technologies and continuously enhancing my skills, striving for excellence in delivering solutions and driving innovation in software development.
